title.rendered: retrofit magazine names modern collection in top 50 products of 2016

content.rendered:
The Modern Collection was listed as number eight of retrofit Magazine’s “Top 50 Products of 2016.” The products that made the list received the most reader inquiries from the magazine’s September-October 2015 through July-August 2016 issues.

Included in a previously-run feature, the editor writes, “Eldorado Stone has released its Modern Collection, which provides clean lines and a neutral color palette while manifesting Eldorado Stone’s commitment to authenticity. Featuring six profiles in smooth and texturized applications, the Modern Collection offers larger, linear stones in 34 new colors with cool gray, soothing black and winter white tones.”
